pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 1, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, August 1, 2017:

Vancouver, British Columbia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Vancouver, Gregor Robertson.

Vancouver Ministers’ Regional Office
300 West Georgia Street‎                       

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

Media appearances

7:20 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Global News Morning BC.

7:45 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CBC Radio One Vancouver.

8:30 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Breakfast Television Vancouver.

 

Note: all times local
